summary.span: 衍生自 類別的物件可變動集合。

span.span: A mutable collection of objects derived from the class.

summary.span: 這個類別之設計可用於包含主體的多重值屬性。

span.span: This class is designed to be used for multi-valued properties that contain Principals.

summary.span: 管理這個集合的內容，會變更對應存放區屬性的內容，當 在相對應主體物件上被呼叫時，會成為永久的變更。

span.span: Manipulating the contents of this collection changes the contents of the corresponding store property, which is made permanent when is called on the corresponding principal object.

span.span: Copies the objects from this into the specified array, starting at the specified position index in array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `array` 必須是一維陣列。`array` must be one-dimensional. 如果未列出，請就會擲回。If it is not, an is thrown. 進一步的例外狀況擲回，如果要複製的項目數大於從可用的空間`index`到結尾`array`，如果`array`是`null`，或如果`index`小於 0。Further exceptions are thrown if the number of elements to copy is greater than the available space from `index` to the end of `array`, if `array` is `null`, or if `index` is less than 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就概念而言，每個執行個體具有與其相關聯的單一列舉。Conceptually, each instance of has a single enumerator associated with it. 雖然多次呼叫傳回相異物件，它們會共用相同的內部狀態。Although multiple calls to return distinct objects, they share the same internal state.

summary.span: 從陣列中指定的位置索引開始，將 物件從這個 複製到指定的陣列中。

span.span: Copies the objects from this into the specified array, starting at the specified position index in array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `array` 必須是一維陣列。`array` must be one-dimensional. 如果未列出，請就會擲回。If it is not, an is thrown. 進一步的例外狀況擲回，如果要複製的項目數大於從可用的空間`index`到結尾`array`，如果`array`是`null`，或如果`index`小於 0。Further exceptions are thrown if the number of elements to copy is greater than the available space from `index` to the end of `array`, if `array` is `null`, or if `index` is less than 0.

summary.span: 傳回可以逐一查看 中主體的列舉程式。

span.span: Returns an enumerator to iterate through the principals in the .
An containing the principals in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就概念而言，每個執行個體具有與其相關聯的單一列舉。Conceptually, each instance of has a single enumerator associated with it. 雖然多次呼叫傳回相異物件，它們會共用相同的內部狀態。Although multiple calls to return distinct objects, they share the same internal state.
